EmailTemplate.description: This is used as a template for individual user registration.
EmailTemplate.name: IAM_Successfull_Registration_Individual
EmailTemplate.subject: Your registration request with Cummins
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cummins
Thank you for your interest in a Cummins Online Login account. Your registration for {!Account.Name} has been successfully submitted.An e-mail containing next steps will be sent to you. A Cummins representative may contact you to validate your information or request additional information. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact 1-800-CUMMINSâ„¢ or your Cummins account representative. Thank you for your interest in Cummins. Cummins https://cumminsengines.com/customer-care.aspx If you have trouble clicking on the button, please click to here. This auto-generated e-mail invitation is sent from Cummins.
